content: > a rastafarian tam or crown also > known as a rasta hat or rasta tam is > like a loose and roomy tam shaped > almost like a flattened bubble or a > bubble with a flattened top large > enough to safely tuck your dreadlocks > inside from time to time it may or > may not have a visor or a band > > *yarn needed* wool preferred or cotton yarn in worsted sport or dk > weight in the following traditional > colours - red gold green black > black is optional > > *crochet hook in size which will produce a dense fabric
